page.title: 11People Of Coalville:
page.content: {Alan Sanderson:} { }Alan can remember when{ {Broadway Shopping Centre}was just fields used for fairs. There were a lot of small shops along High Street, where you could buy four things for a penny. Lots more houses have been built on Jackson Street, where previously there were fields. Alan used to go to{The Grand}which was a dance hall, but is now a discotheque called{Phaze 111.}He would like to see more cinemas in Coalville. If there was a major disaster in Coalville Alan thinks the people would help in any way they could, as it is a generally helpful community. There has only ever been one disaster in Coalville, that was{Whitwick Mines {Disaster}when everyone rallied round and helped.
